short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AES Encryption/Decryption extension accessible directly on the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are looking to add an extra level of encryption on your data, install Protext with the click of a button. Protext allows users to encrypt their data using a special encryption algorithm called AES. Share a secret encryption/decryption code with your friend to start sending cryptic messages.
